organizations: Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Khloe Kardashian
title: Khloe Kardashian gets major makeover
text:
Khloe Kardashian gets major makeover amid Lamar Odom’s medical crisis Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Khloe Kardashian gets major makeover amid Lamar Odom’s medical crisis Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Khloe Kardashian officially calls off divorce 1:35 
Khloe Kardashian and Lamar Odom have officially called off their divorce. October 22nd 2015 /video/video.news.com.au/Entertainment/ 
KHLOE Kardashian skipped Kim’s birthday party to stay at husband Lamar Odom’s bedside. 
But after nearly two weeks out of the spotlight, she left the hospital to celebrate her big sister’s baby shower — and debut a fresh new look. 
The 31-year-old’s hairdresser, Jen Atkin, shared a snap of the reality TV star’s new textured, collarbone-grazing cut, dubbed the “fashion lob.” 
“Guess who just joined the #ShortHairDontCare club! Do we like? #LOBS4LIFE,” Atkin, a celebrity hairdresser who has styled A-listers such as Katy Perry, Jessica Alba and Sofia Vergara, wrote on Instagram. New look 
The soiree was held at a private mansion in Beverly Hills, where the Kardashian and Jenner sisters all wore striped PJs. Other Stories
